document_data.name: Dwarven Mir
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dwarven Mir''' was a large walled compound located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The compound was located in the eastern section of Almorel. It bordered the city's outer wall.
document_data.Description: Aside from the residence of [[Mechnik]] [[Nikitsky]], the Dwarven Mir was the largest compound found in Amorel.
document_data.Activities: The Dwarven Mir was a small [[dwarf|dwarven]] community.
